name: Water pipes: pipeline
description:
Water pipes is the one of the best puzzle games in the market.
All you need to do is to rotate pipes, connect them and make water paths.
Touch the pies to turn them.
Construct a water path from valve to container.
Solve puzzles fast to collect more water.
You can play 4 interesting modes Firefighter,Pressure,Multicolor and Classic .

*Firefighter mode - make path with pipes to burning house to extinguish the fire.
*Classic mode - connect pipes,open valve and fill the reservoir with water.
*Pressure mode - connect all valves to pressure device and provide the needed pressure.
*Multicolor mode- connect the valve to its corresponding reservoir bearing in mind the color of the valve.

Solve puzzles fast and get more experience points.
You can always use hints if you have got stuck in some level.

Features:
* 500+ Fantastic levels
* Nice graphics
* Hint system

This game is without a doubt one of the best pipe puzzle games in the market.
So what are you waiting for?
Download this game for Free and became the and your fantastic adventures!
